items.summary: Ensure each production (live) build produces a concrete, unique frontend build version (not a placeholder) and that the deployed appâ€™s `meta[name="app-version"]` and `frontend/src/generated/appVersion.ts` contain that concrete value so the app update guard can reliably detect stale assets.

Add a safe runtime fallback so that if the generated build version is still a placeholder at runtime, the app stamps `meta[name="app-version"]` with a newly generated unique value (e.g., timestamp + random suffix) to enable cache-busting refresh behavior instead of leaving `runningVersion` null.

Expose minimal diagnostics (English UI text) in an existing developer-only area to confirm which version is running on live: show the current `runningVersion` (from the meta tag) and the `BUILD_VERSION` value so cache issues can be verified without browser console access.
